i ve studied ballet all my life.
my favorite drink is caramel cappuccino.
My family is small, but we are close.

participant_2.background:
I am proud of being able to make my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job.
I have never been married, but I've been with my partner for over ten years.
I remember playing with my cat in the backyard all day long.
I caught a huge fish on my last fishing trip!
I have my number and my freedom.

content.text: Happy Birthday to me! I went to a bar in San Francisco to celebrate with friends.
Happy Birthday! What'd you do there?
We had karaoke and played pool, and I got a caramel cappuccino.
That sounds like fun! I love caramel cappuccinos.
My family is small, but we're close. I don't have any kids, but I love my dog.
That's cool. I'm with my partner for over ten years, but we're not married.
That's great! I'm glad you're happy.
Thanks! I'm a musician, and I'm proud to be able to make my passion a reality, even though I have a day job.
That's amazing! I love music. I wish I could play an instrument.
You can! It's never too late to learn.
I know, but I don't know where to start.
There are tons of resources online. You can also find lessons in your area.
Thanks for the advice! I might just look into it.
You're welcome! I hope you have a great day!
